## ComponentManager.getComponentsInfo() method

Get components with version info (for debugging/monitoring)

**Signature:**

```typescript
getComponentsInfo(): Array<{
        name: string;
        version?: string;
        description?: string;
        scope: ComponentScope;
        priority: number;
        enabled: boolean;
    }>;
```
